manipulators.description: option + command + j -> option + shift + left
option + command + l -> option + shift + right
u -> move cursor to line start
option + command + u -> select line, cursor home
o -> move cursor to line end
option + command + o -> select line, cursor end
option + shift + i -> mouse wheel up
option + shift + k -> mouse wheel down
option + shift + j -> mouse wheel left
option + shift + l -> mouse wheel right
shift + command + u -> mouse left click
option + shift + u -> mouse left click
shift + command + o -> mouse right click
option + shift + o -> mouse right click
shift + command + h -> mouse middle click
option + shift + h -> mouse middle click

to.shell_command: open -a 'Microsoft Outlook'; open -a 'Intellij IDEA'; open -a 'Google Chrome'; open -a telegram; open -a notes; open -a postman; open -a 'Docker Desktop'; open -a zoom.us; open -a keepassxc

manipulators.description: Hyper + space -> Language Switch (Previous Input Language)
Hyper + command + space -> Next Input Language in Input Menu
option + command + i -> option + shift + page_up
option + command + k -> option + shift + page_down
option + command + y -> shift + command + home
option + command + h -> shift + command + end
